meanings.definition: A person or entity that makes an offer.
meanings.sent1: The offerors presented their proposals at the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The potential offerors were eager to negotiate the terms.
meanings.sent3: The offerors decided to play a game of 'who can make the best offer'.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, offerors are like players in a high-stakes poker game.
meanings.sent5: The offerors stood out with their unique approach to the deal.
